schema.name: Sky-High Fibre Toast - Banana
recipeIngredient: 0.25 Cup ( 8 oz--250 ml ), Ice Cold Water

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix together the sugar substitute, Quick Cook Oats, and Non-Fat milk until well blended.
Peel the banana and cut it into slices.
Fry the eggs to your liking, preferably using a non-stick pan to minimize the need for added fats.
Toast the whole wheat bread slices until they're golden and crispy.
Assemble the toast by spreading the oat mixture on the toasted bread, add a layer of fried egg and top with banana slices.
Drizzle ice cold water over the assembled toast for added freshness.

schema.description: Indulge in a delicious breakfast option with our Sky-High Fibre Toast - Banana recipe. It's a health-conscious choice that's low in sugar and high in nutrients, perfect for those looking to maintain a healthy lifestyle without sacrificing taste. This recipe transforms simple ingredients into a wholesome meal that's both satisfying and nutritious.
